mita amatharawa guwan widuli wargikarana samagam daththa anuwa eksath janapadaya pura kantirana sangithayata sawan denno parada manaya pasugiya dashakaya purama sathiyakata wadihitiyan miliyana 77.3 ka eekakari thathwayakin pawathina.
